TopicTitle: Viewing Resources / Max Resources Consumed or Gained in operation while in VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

While building my rocket I would like to know the resources on board and the (estimated) rate they are consumed (or generated in the case of electric charge). I looked around and I cannot find a way other than having a calculator and a scratch pad in front of me. Is there a mod for this or is there some window I overlooked in the VAB?

EDIT: For the record, I know about the Kerbal Engineer Redux mod and it comes close to what I am looking for here. However it does not give me max burn/charge rates for the craft. I still have to calculate that by hand
